about.details:
Mumbai based Billwin Industries Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of protective gear which are life jackets, inflatable boats, and rainwear. The raw material for manufacturing protective gear (called Coated Fabric) is purchased by the company from domestic and international markets.

The product range of the company includes rainwear coat, rucksack, life jackets, winter jacket, inflatable boats dinghys, river raft boat, sleeping bags, facial mask, and pulsar jacket.

The manufacturing unit of the company is located at Bhandup West Mumbai Maharashtra with approximately 5190 sq. ft area. This facility is equipped with semi-automatic and automated equipment. The company sells products through tenders and distributors & retailers. The distribution channel of the company covers Maharashtra, Kerala, Gujrat, Chattisgarh, Tamilnadu, Assam, Haryana, and Trivandrum Tripura.

The company also sells products through e-commerce platforms such as Amazon, Flipkart, Shopcules Xerve, and Buy Hatke.

Competitive Strengths

1. Quality services
2. Semi-automated units
3. Diversified product portfolio
4. Existing distribution network

faqs.question: What is the Billwin Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Billwin Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 666000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.46 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹37 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on June 18, 2020, and closes on June 22, 2020.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Billwin Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Billwin Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Billwin Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Billwin Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Billwin Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Billwin Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Billwin Industries IPO opens on June 18, 2020 and closes on June 22, 2020.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Billwin Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Billwin Industries IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,11,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Billwin Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Billwin Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
